mapper.insert: insert into tbl_community (community_title, community_content, member_number) values(#{communityTitle}, #{communityContent}, #{memberNumber})
mapper.select: select tc.community_number, tc.community_title, tcf.community_file_name, tm.member_id, tc.community_date, tc.community_view_count from tbl_community tc left outer join tbl_community_file tcf on tc.community_number = tcf.community_number join tbl_member tm on tc.member_number = tm.member_number order by tc.community_number desc limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}
select count(community_title) from tbl_community where community_title like #{searchText}

select tc.community_number, tc.community_title, tc.community_date, tm.member_id, tc.community_view_count, tc.community_content from tbl_community tc join tbl_member tm on tc.member_number = tm.member_number where tc.community_number = #{communityNumber}
